title: Know Your Child Deeply
itunes:author: Featured Guest: Lee Nienhuis
itunes:summary:
John and Danny give hope to parents who are discouraged by their child's behavior and offer tips for knowing your child well.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Lee Nienhuis' book "Brave Moms, Brave Kids" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2020-12-01?refcd=1037001

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/know-your-child-deeply/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
